text: Table 8-1. How long it takes to build production-grade infrastructure from scratch [IENEVE T Amazon RDS 1-2 weeks Self-managed distributed system (stateless) A duster of Node.js apps in an ASG PR Self-managed distributed system (stateful) Elasticsearch cluster 2-4 months Entire architecture Apps, data stores, load balancers, monitoring, etc. 6-36 months
